com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall

Class UninstallScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall.UninstallScheduler

  • public class UninstallScheduler
extends AbstractScheduler
    This scheduler uninstalls the framework and releases all of its resources.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UninstallScheduler

        public UninstallScheduler(int port,
                          java.time.Duration apiServerInitTimeout,
                          StateStore stateStore,
                          ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore)
        Creates a new UninstallScheduler based on the provided API port and initialization timeout, and a StateStore. The UninstallScheduler builds an uninstall Plan with two Phases: a resource phase where all reserved resources get released back to Mesos, and a deregister phase where the framework deregisters itself and cleans up its state in Zookeeper.
